TopicTitle: Enter the Squad and Shapeways "Holiday Takeoff" Contest!

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bit.ly/MpkQ9h"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/982f2b3b8b220cfa56926d1fefe2b4e6/tumblr_inline_neuhj8z9PJ1rr2wit.jpg"/></a></p>

<p>The holidays are almost here. it’s a time when you take off from your responsibilities and take off for family gatherings (but please don’t take off your pants after all those delicious holiday meals). Squad and <a href="http://bit.ly/MpkQ9h"><strong>SHAPEWAYS</strong></a> are also now giving you the chance to take off some funds from the regular price of a 3D print in the “Holiday Takeoff” contest.”<br/><br/>For the next two Fridays on our <a href="http://bit.ly/1u6LXZJ"><strong>TWITTER</strong></a> page, we’re going to ask you a question. Reply back via a tweet with your answer, @kerbalspacep, @shapeways and #KSPShapes and you’ll be entered into a random drawing to win one of several Shapeways discount codes. One lucky winner each week will win a featured KSP 3D Print from Shapeways and another lucky winner each week will win a copy of KSP for Steam!</p>

<p><br/>The Shapeways print you’ll be playing for this week is the <a href="http://bit.ly/1v09cH2"><strong>KERBAL RECRUIT</strong></a>. We’ll see you on Friday. Good luck!</p>
